amendment.description: To provide for four flood control structures in Marmaton, Kansas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2102 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2102 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S14007-14008; text: CR S14007) To provide for four flood control structures in Marmaton, Kansas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2102 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2102 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Brownback.
